body:
Hi Ding,

I know this is somewhat tangential to the main focus of this discussion but I fixed the bug in the glazing ratio component that you were experiencing.  To be honest.  I don't know why you got two different ways to break up the window for two different directions but I have put in a check that catches the situation and corrects it.  You can get the new working component by syncing with the github and you can see it working correctly in the attached file.
